segments.text: I see you just graduated from college . What was your GPA ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It wasn't as high as I would have liked . It was 2.5 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you think it wasn â€™ t higher than that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I participated in several extracurricular activities . And I worked 2 jobs to put myself through school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wo , wo , that certainly is a lot for a young man to take on .
segments.speaker: S1
